channel.title: CVE Feed for WECON -- PLC Editor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WECON -- PLC Editor

item.title: CVE-2018-14792|2024-09-16T20:27:47.262Z -- wecon -- plc%20editor
item.description: WECON PLC Editor version 1.3.3U may allow an attacker to execute code under the current process when processing project files.

item.title: CVE-2021-42705|2024-09-16T20:01:34.731Z -- wecon -- plc%20editor
item.description: PLC Editor Versions 1.3.8 and prior is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow while processing project files, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2021-42707|2024-09-16T20:06:24.090Z -- wecon -- plc%20editor
item.description: PLC Editor Versions 1.3.8 and prior is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write while processing project files, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
